parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Detection

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Return a list of all units (all persons except agents) outside and inside vehicles, created on the following sides [[east]], [[west]], [[resistance]]/[[independent]] and [[civilian]] only. Does not contain units of [[sideLogic]]. Dead units and units awaiting for respawn are also excluded. 
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>To get all units of given side, use <tt>[[units]] [[Side]]</tt>.</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''allUnits'''

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>{_x [[setDamage]] 0.5; _x [[groupChat]] "Braaains"} [[forEach]] [[allUnits]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[allPlayers]], [[allGroups]], [[allDead]], [[playableUnits]], [[switchableUnits]], [[units]], [[vehicles]], [[allUnitsUAV]], [[allCurators]], [[playersNumber]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class='command_description'>
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dd class="notedate">Posted on September 6, 2018</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Pierre MGI|Pierre MGI]]</dt>
<dd class="note">It returns also BIS_SUPP_HQ created by support modules and headquarters Entity from HQ modules. 


<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
